summary: The Pray Safe Act of 2025 mandates the establishment of a Federal Clearinghouse within the Department of Homeland Security to provide safety and security best practices and information on federal grant programs for nonprofit organizations, faith-based organizations, and houses of worship. The Clearinghouse will develop evidence-based recommendations, offer training materials, and compile resources for the mentioned groups. It also requires a GAO report on federal grants related to this topic, and will sunset four years after enactment.
